caption: An elderly man stands in front of a Christmas tree, while a younger man sits behind a desk. The older man carefully guides the younger man, whose desk is filled with various recording devices. He patiently reads from a script. In another part of the room, a person covered with a towel smokes and reclines on a sofa. After a while, they get up from the sofa and change the record on a phonograph. Behind the man, a woman in pajamas emerges from a room. Below a mottled wall, there is a sofa with a man and a woman seated on it. In the room, a man in a suit stands practicing. The scenes switch to various situations where the man is addressing the public. In the end, an airplane lands on a lawn, and after the pilot exits the plane, he engages in conversation with another man.
